entry.summary: RT Elan Halpern If you're new to the crypto space (let's face it - we all are) you know it can feel like information overload... To break things down, I teamed up with @MyBFF to create some bite-sized intro to NFT videos 😎 Check out the full series here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA26elVwRcKhUsBp5zchqdnTZ8VwcOfWP

entry.summary: RT ansgar.eth 🦇🔊 Quick personal update: Tuesday was my last day at Quilt, I am now a member of the Ethereum Foundation research team. I‘ll basically continue to do the same work as before, but have been drifting more towards pure research for a while now, so that move made sense.
